mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sore ( owner_id, area_id, store_category_id, store_name, store_desc, store_addr, phone, sotre_img, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, advice) VALUES (#{owner.userId}, #{area.areaId}, #{storeCategory.storeCategoryId}, #{storeName}, #{storeDesc}, #{sotreAddr}, #{phone}, #{storeImg}, #{priority}, #{createTIme}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{advice})
